virtual bool CreateControlInfo (ByteSeq &cInfo)=0
 Create and encode control info class.

Detailed Description

MPEG2 DRM encryptor with IPMPX signalling and additional functionality.

Encryptor class with additional functionality of creating control info class, used by MPEG2 DRM encoder.

Definition at line 30 of file MPEG2IPMPXDRMEncryptor.h.

Member Function Documentation

virtual bool DRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXDRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXDRMEncryptor::CreateControlInfo (  ByteSeq &  cInfo  )  [pure virtual]
 

Create and encode control info class.

Control info class is this encryptor's (tool's) description, used for later correct initialization.

Parameters:
cInfo output, encoded control info class.
Returns:
Boolean indicating success or failure.

Implemented in DRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXDRMPlugin::AES128CTROpenIPMPMPEG2IPMPXDRMEncryptor, and DRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXDRMPlugin::BlowfishOpenIPMPMPEG2IPMPXDRMEncryptor.
